TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit KeyAgreement extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: This class provides the functionality of a key agreement (or key exchange) protocol.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public Java.Security.IKey? DoPhase (Java.Security.IKey? key, bool lastPhase);
.method public hidebysig instance class Java.Security.IKey DoPhase(class Java.Security.IKey key, bool lastPhase) cil managed

Docs.param: the key for this phase. For example, in the case of Diffie-Hellman between 2 parties, this would be the other party's Diffie-Hellman public key.
flag which indicates whether or not this is the last phase of this key agreement.
Docs.summary: Executes the next phase of this key agreement with the given key that was received from one of the other parties involved in this key agreement.
Docs.returns: the (intermediate) key resulting from this phase, or null if this phase does not yield a key

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if the specified key cannot be used in this key agreement or this phase,
if this instance has not been initialized.

Docs.summary: Generates the shared secret and returns it in a new buffer.
Docs.returns: the new buffer with the shared secret

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if this key agreement is not complete.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Javax.Crypto.ISecretKey GenerateSecret(string algorithm) cil managed

Docs.param: the algorithm to for the SecretKey
Docs.summary: Generates the shared secret and returns it in a new buffer.
Docs.returns: the new buffer with the shared secret

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if this key agreement is not complete.
if the specified algorithm for the secret key does not exists.
if a SecretKey with the specified algorithm cannot be created using the generated shared secret.

if the specified buffer is too small for the shared secret.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class Javax.Crypto.KeyAgreement GetInstance(string algorithm) cil managed

Docs.param: the standard name of the requested key agreement algorithm. See the KeyAgreement section in the Java Cryptography Architecture Standard Algorithm Name Documentation for information about standard algorithm names.
Docs.summary: Returns a KeyAgreement object that implements the specified key agreement algorithm.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if no installed provider can provide the requested algorithm.
if the specified algorithm is null.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Init(class Java.Security.IKey key) cil managed

Docs.param: the party's private information. For example, in the case of the Diffie-Hellman key agreement, this would be the party's own Diffie-Hellman private key.
Docs.summary: Initializes this key agreement with the given key, which is required to contain all the algorithm parameters required for this key agreement.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if the specified key cannot be used to initialize this key agreement.
